about_the_game:
Introducing "Boundless Lust" – the captivating visual novel game created by Farix. In "Boundless Lust," players make choices that shape the storyline, leading to different outcomes. Dive into a rich, story-driven experience.

Story:
Ava, 27, and Ethan, 30, met while working together—Ava as a secretary and Ethan as a financial advisor and then they got married. After a year of marriage, Ethan landed a great job, and the couple moved to a new city for better opportunities and a fresh start. Now, many life-changing events await them, and the outcome of their story depends on the choices you make.

Farix has poured dedication into ensuring "Boundless Lust" delivers top-notch quality. The game features compelling narratives, intriguing characters, and unexpected twists.

"Boundless Lust" isn't just a game; it's an immersive storytelling experience crafted with care. For those eager to embark on this adventure.

content_descriptors.notes:
Caution: This game is for adults only and contains 
explicit content including Sexual content and Nudity, Realistic genitals and Sexual acts, Use of strong language, drug and alcohol use, graphic gore and Violence, mature themes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel based or M1 under Rosetta
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

name: Boundless Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
